item.description:
Hi Everyone,

If you want to join a group of people going to the Warren Miller Movie Wednesday 9PM Show then RSVP here. Tickets are on sale at the Portsmouth Music Hall Box Office or at Putnam's Ski Shop. Go to the Music Hall Link below if you want to order online or by phone. (603) 436-2400

We'll meet for dinner prior to the show at 7pm at Flatbread Pizza around the corner. See the links below for details and directions to the Portsmouth Music Hall

http://www.skinet.com...


Celebrating 61 Years of Warren Miller Films


Do you have a skiing or snowboarding problem? Do you always take "just one more" run? If you answered “yes” to either of these, it may be time for a Wintervention. Narrated by skiing icon Jonny Moseley, Warren Miller’s Wintervention is the definitive solution for the snow-obsessed. Wintervention takes riders like Chris Davenport, Jonny Moseley and Lindsey Vonn on a global tour of Alaska, Norway, Canada, Antarctica and beyond… delivering a successful Wintervention for all of us in need. Warren Miller films attract a cult-like following and mark the official start of winter for sports enthusiasts everywhere. Warren Miller premieres are an experience, a party and a phenomenon not to be missed.

http://www.skinet.com...

Portsmouth Music Hall

Flatbread Pizza Web Site

Directions to Flatbread Pizza Company

Please be sure to purchase your tickets in advance as these shows almost always sell out.
item.name: Warren Miller Wintervention Skiing Movie at Portsmouth Music Hall
